name: Friday Night Funkin': Unchecked Suffering mod
name_original: Friday Night Funkin': Unchecked Suffering mod
description:
I was thinking to myself one day, wondering why Left Unchecked and Unknown Suffering sound so similar, and then I found out why, and then I decided to make a mod with the two songs mashed together! Enjoy!

Also, I AM aware that there is a bug that soft locks the game, and as of now, I don't know how to fix it. So, when you're finished with the song, just close out of the game.
